SIGRO

About This Platform

Our platform provides a collection of essential digital security tools designed to protect and verify your data online. Whether you're a developer, student, or simply someone who values privacy, you can easily: Encrypt and decrypt text securely, Generate strong cryptographic hashes (e.g., SHA-256), Digitally sign your files and verify signatures, Check websites for SSL validity and malware threats. All tools are free, instant, and run securely in your browser or through our API. This platform was built to make cybersecurity tools accessible to everyone â€” without complexity or cost.
